Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.29040295] Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=16 μg/ml; MBC=64 μg/ml), Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=64 μg/ml; MBC=256 μg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC=512 μg/ml; MBC>512 μg/ml);Fungi:Candida albicans (MIC=128 μg/ml; MBC=128 μg/ml)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.29040295] 0% haemolysis at 0.20 μg/ml,  5% haemolysis at 0.39 μg/ml,  25% haemolysis at 0.78 μg/ml,  85% haemolysis at 1.56 μg/ml,  95% haemolysis at 3.13 μg/ml,  100% haemolysis at 6.25 μg/ml against mouse red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against the Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria. Antifungal activity.

Literature.Title: Hydrophobic residues are critical for the helix-forming, hemolytic and bactericidal activities of amphipathic antimicrobial peptide TP4.
Literature.Author: Chang TW, Wei SY, Wang SH, Wei HM, Wang YJ, Wang CF, Chen C, Liao YD.
